Travelling anytime soon? Use your ADCB MasterCard Credit Card to book online with Emirates and save up to 15% on your ticket booking.       


 Valid on:
All Emirates destinations
 Dates of travel:30th April - 30th November, 2015

Go to www.emirates.com/mastercard and book your tickets today!
Don't forget to use the promotion code GEMCARD while making the booking
What's more, when you purchase your tickets online with Emirates, you can enjoy a 0% interest payment plan for 3 months with the Emirates Advantage program

The Zero Interest offer is valid only for online transactions made at emirates.ae with your ADCB Credit Card (excluding ADCB Islamic Credit Card). The 3 months Installment Payment Plan is valid on a minimum purchase of AED 500. Emirates Advantage program is only applicable for online purchased tickets at emirates.ae. Tickets issued from the Emirates Ticketing Office or Travel Agents are not eligible for this payment option. Please note - your journey MUST originate from Dubai to be eligible for this program.

Offer.OfferDesc: Use your ADCB Card to shop online and get amazing offers from Shop and Ship.
Offer.OfferDescDetail:
Use your ADCB Card and have your shopping delivered to your doorstep at affordable courier rates with the Shop and Ship Service by Aramex, and you can take advantage of the following:


- Free Shop and Ship Lifetime Membership for ADCB Platinum, Infinite, Privilege and Excellency Card holders
- 50% off Shop and Ship Lifetime Membership for ADCB Gold and Standard Cardholders
- 10% off shipping charges during the promotion period on the Shop and Ship shipment
- Free SNS Protect during the promotion period
- 50% off extra on the special commodity services


To enjoy your free lifetime membership offer:
-Log on to shopandship.com
-Click on Sign Up
-On the Payment page, enter the first 6 digits of your card number  in the promo code field followed by SNS, example 123456SNS to get the free membership

To enjoy  10% discount on shipping:
-Log on to shopandship.com
-Click on your shipment and click Pay Now
-On the payment page, enter the first 6 digits of your card number in the promo code field followed by SHIP, example 123456SHIP


* To learn more about how Shop and Ship works, please click here

  

Validity: 

Offer valid from 24th November 2014 until 15th February 2015

 

For more information please call 800 2030
